import React from 'react' import { Row, Col, Card, Button, Carousel } from 'react-bootstrap' import useFetch from '../Hooks/useFetch' function Home() { // api call using usefect custom hook return a result const data = useFetch('https://dummyjson.com/products') console.log(data); return ( <>

First slide label

Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue mollis interdum.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

{ data?.length>0?data?.map((product,index)=>( {product?.title}

{product?.description.slice(0,55)}...

${product?.price}
 )):

} ) } export default Home
